item.title: The Media Trust & ExchangeWire Release Global Malware Study
item.description:
The Media Trust & ExchangeWire Release Global Malware Study

Today ExchangeWire released the first global study of the perceptions of malware and malvertising in the digital advertising ecosystem. The research and accompanying report were created in partnership with The Media Trust, the world's leading media verification, malware protection, and advertising quality assurance platform.

item.title: Top Bartenders Name Their Favorite Drinking Cities
item.description:
Top Bartenders Name Their Favorite Drinking Cities

item.title: Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open
item.description:
Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open

It's been a big year for Lavazza. Not only is it their 120th anniversary, they've also partnered with the Italian Pavillon at the World Exposition Milan 2015 and expanded their tennis partnerships to include a sponsorship of the US Open.

item.title: 7 Pimm's Cup recipes for spring.
item.description:
7 Pimm's Cup recipes for spring.

If Spring had an official cocktail, the Pimm's Cup would be it. It's ultra-refreshing, bright and vibrant-and as easy to make as it is to drink. To mix a basic version of the classic British cocktail, all you need is Pimm's No. 1, ginger ale (or some sort of lemon-lime soda), cucumber and lemon.
